summary: Button 'Learn more' on the page 'About us' doesn't work
steps_to_reproduce: 1. Open www.1234.com, 2. Go to 'About us' page, 3.Scroll down to the button 'Learn more', 4. Click on the button 'Learm more'
expected_result: After click on the button 'Learm more' addition information appears
actual_result: After click on the button 'Learm more' no information appears
